backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing portfolio data storage, admin email/password authentication, session handling, and CRUD logic using mixins and maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes for public and admin pages, wraps the app in theming, and initializes seed data.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen informing users they lack permission to access admin pages with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminEmailL: Admin email/password login form that handles authentication, errors, and redirecting to the intended admin path.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/controls/DarkMod: Button to toggle light/dark theme using next-themes with animated sun/moon icons.
Animated typing/deleting word component with reduced‑motion handling and dynamic width reservation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin layout that guards access, renders navigation and header, and handles login redirects and logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright, branding, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Public site layout wrapping pages with navbar and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicNav: Responsive public navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus and dark mode toggle.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Card displaying project details, technologies, image, and links to demo and GitHub.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGuard.ts: Simple guard hook returning admin auth state from the session.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMutations.ts: Collection of React Query mutations for creating, updating, and deleting admin‑managed entities with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Queries for admin contact messages and caller user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens, login/logout mutations, and session validation with shared state and React Query.
Provides a mutation for submitting contact messages and invalidating related queries with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializeSeed.ts: Initializes seed data once for admin callers and refreshes queries after setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook using Dfinity AuthClient with login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioQueries.t: Exports React Query hooks to fetch about info, skills, projects, experiences, and social links from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, global styles, and utility/component classes including animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About section using fetched data with loading skeletons and profile details.
Admin interface for viewing and editing the About page content with form submission.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin landing page listing navigation cards to all management sections like projects, skills, and messages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminExperience: Admin panel to create, edit, and delete experience entries using dialogs and forms.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Admin page to view, mark as read, and delete contact form messages sorted by date.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProjectsPa: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting projects with a dialog-based form and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSkillsPage: Admin page to manage skills, providing CRUD operations via dialogs and tables using portfolio query/mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSocialLink: CRUD interface for social links, allowing admins to add, edit, and delete platform URLs using dialog forms.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation, social links, and message submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/ExperiencePage.tsx: Shows a timeline of experience entries with loading placeholders and fallback messaging.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content with typing animation, links to projects and contact, and quick navigation cards.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays project cards with loading skeletons and fallback when no projects exist.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Loads skills, groups them by category, and displays them in cards with proficiency badges.
frontend/src/utils/adminRedirect.ts: Utility for storing, retrieving, and clearing intended admin redirect paths in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and modifying hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Project-wide metadata describing architecture, features, issues, and versioned state information.
